content: अनुष्ठानं {@--1@} Doing, performance, practice, execution, accomplishment &c.; obeying, acting in conformity to; उपरुध्यते तपोऽनुष्ठानं <ls>Ś. 4</ls> practice of religious austerities; कोऽपि वधोपायश्चिंत्यो यस्यानुष्ठानेन <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; नानुष्ठानैर्विहीनाः स्युः कुलजा विधवा इव <ls>Pt. 2. 95</ls>; <ls>H. 1. 103.</ls> {@--2@} Commencing, undertaking, engaging in; यदि समुद्रेण सह वैरानुष्ठानं कार्यं <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Commencement or course of conduct, procedure, course of action; कथं न्याय्यमनुष्ठानं मादृशः प्रतिषेधतु <ls>U. 5. 21.</ls> {@--4@} Practice of religious rites or ceremonies, any religious rite or ceremony; किंत्वनुष्ठाननित्यत्वं स्वातंत्र्यमपकर्षति <ls>U. 1. 8</ls>; <ls>Mv. 4. 33.</ls> --नी Performance, doing &c.
